title: Well-defined tricobalt tetraoxide's critical morphology effect on the structure–reactivity relationship
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21745-21762
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02971B, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sami Barkaoui, Noureddine Elboughdiri, Djamel Ghernaout, Yacine Benguerba
This review focuses on exploring the intricate relationship between the catalyst particle size and shape on a nanoscale level and how it affects the performance of reactions.
